attributes.action: Call for the EU Referendum vote to be declared void.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the closeness of the result, and having spoken to several people who either never received their papers or papers that were in fact sent to old UK addresses I feel that it this result should be declared void and the British people, no matter where they live or for how long should have their say.
attributes.background:
The situation where ex-pats have resided outside the UK for more than 15 years is undemocratic and unfair.
The decision to bar ex-pats from a democratic vote that can severely affect their lives is one which must not be tolerated.

rejection.details:
These petitions are very similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/128201

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
